title: Tesla Inc. stock falls Monday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        +5.73%
       slipped 1.60% to $208.80 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.48%
       rising 0.32% to 15,360.29 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.13%
       rising 0.36% to 38,001.81. Tesla Inc. closed $90.49 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (116.6 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 116.3 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Slowing demand for electric vehicles is to blame.
